overview: This is the story of a dysfunctional family in which each member engages in an illicit activity, but they don't know this about each other. One day, the Contreras family witnesses a police operation outside the building in which they live and, believing that they are coming for them, each member decides to hide incriminating objects in their room.

production_companies.name: Consejo Nacional para la cultura y las artes

title: The Contreras Family
